thread.title: Dinakaran appointment AIADMK deputy general secretary
thread.title_full: Dinakaran appointment AIADMK deputy general secretary

author: Internet Desk
title: Dinakaran appointment AIADMK deputy general secretary
text:
February 15, 2017 10:01 IST   10:01 IST more-in The two were expelled by former Chief Minister Jayalalithaa in 2011. 
A day after V.K. Sasikala, put in place a plan of succession by getting PWD Minister Edappadi K. Palanaswami, as the leader of the AIADMK Legislative Party, she readmited TTV Dinakaran and Venkatesan, into AIADMK. 
Incidentally, the two were expelled by former Chief Minister Jayalalithaa in 2011. 
Here are the latest developments. Dinakaran is Sasikala's deputy 
T.T.V. Dinakaran appointment AIADMK deputy general secretary. 
Sasikala readmits TTV Dinakaran and Venkatesan into AIADMK. 
'Waiting for Governor's call 
Elambai Tamilselvan Mla from Perambalur constituency says 125 MLAs at Golden Bay resort. MLAS are free. He says MLAs would vacate the resort once governor calls. 
Sevvoor S.Ramachandran, Minister for Hindu Religious and Charitable Endowments says he is safe and free at Golden Bay Resorts. He denied rumours that he tried to escape from resort.
